BodDou326.First Lines:
ffor goddis love in trinyteAlle that ben hende herkneth to
                    me…
BodDou326.Last Lines:
…The blysse of heuen thei had to medeThat lesteth euer
                    moo
BodDou326.Attributed Title:
Hic incipit vita de Amys & Amylion (f. 1);  Explicit vita de
                        Amys & Amylion (f. 13vb)

BLEge2862.First Lines: fOr goddes loue in trinyteAl þat ben hend herkeniþ to me…
BLEge2862.Last Lines: …Þe blisse of heuen þey had to medeÞat lasteþ euer more amen
BLEge2862.Attributed Title: Amus & Amylion (running titles split across opening throughout).

BLHar2386.First Lines: ffor god ys loue yn trinyteAl þat buth here herkeneth me…
BLHar2386.Last Lines: …my lyf y haue for lorebrodyr sayde Sir Amylyonwhy…
BLHar2386.Note: 894 lines. Ends imperfectly after first word of new line, though space blank for writing further.

NLS1921.First Lines:
…ere of hem bliþe[ ]ere of mode[ ] seuen ȝere
                    old y was[ ]ede of hem blis…
NLS1921.Note:
2288 lines in this MS, excluding fragments; begins and ends imperfectly
                    due to portions of folios 48 and 61 being cut away.
